s: Polar Fox is the symbol of defiance and liberty. With our high quality products you can defy all odds. We make only the best Combat, Motorcycle and Extreme Outdoor Boots. Our products are extensively used by Law Enforcement, Military, Construction Workers and Motorcyclists.

Since 1983, we have made it our motive to create shoes that are not only unique to your personality but leave a long and lasting impression on others. Conal Footwear was established on the pillars of belief and founded by a system that provides high quality footwear at a reasonable price.
